validation.one-of: This field does not contain a valid value.
validation.not-one-of: This field does not contain a valid value.
validation.min: This field must contain a minimum of {min} characters.
validation.min-number: This field can be the minimum number of {min}.
validation.min-date: This field can only be {min} date and later.
validation.max: This field can be the maximum number of {min}.
validation.max-number: This field can be the maximum number of {max}.
validation.max-date: This field can contain the date of {max} at latest.
validation.matches: This field does not contain the required values.
validation.email: This field must contain a valid email address.
validation.url: This field must contain a valid URL that begins with http or https.
validation.uuid: This field must contain a valid UUID.
validation.trim: This field must not contain spaces at its beginning or end.
validation.lowercase: This field should contain only lowercase letters.
validation.uppercase: This field should contain only capital letters.
validation.less-than: This field must be less than {less}.
validation.more-than: This field must be more than {more}.
validation.not-equal: This field cannot be equal to {notEqual}
validation.positive: This field must contain a positive value.
validation.negative: This field must contain a negative value.
validation.number: The field must only include numbers.
validation.integer: The field must only include numbers.
validation.invalid-password: This field must contain both uppercase and lowercase letters and at least one number. It must contain at least 8 characters.
validation.max-array: Must contain no more than {max} items.
validation.invalid-zip-code: Please enter a valid zip code.
